item.title: Wavelet Latent Diffusion (Wala): Billion-Parameter 3D Generative Model with Compact Wavelet Encodings
item.description: WaLa: a billion-parameter 3D generative model using wavelet encodings achieves state-of-the-art results, generating high-quality 3D shapes in seconds.
